meanings.definition: To change in form, appearance, or structure
meanings.sent1: The caterpillar transforms into a butterfly.
meanings.sent2: The artist transforms a blank canvas into a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent3: The old, dusty attic transforms into a cozy reading nook.
meanings.sent4: Her smile transforms the room into a brighter place.
meanings.sent5: The magic wand transforms ordinary objects into extraordinary ones.

meanings.definition: To undergo a change or alteration
meanings.sent1: The tadpole transforms into a frog.
meanings.sent2: The weather transforms from sunny to rainy in minutes.
meanings.sent3: The boring lecture transforms into an exciting game show.
meanings.sent4: His words transform her mood from sad to happy.
meanings.sent5: The potion transforms the color of the liquid from blue to red.

meanings.definition: To convert into another form or substance
meanings.sent1: The machine transforms raw materials into finished products.
meanings.sent2: The chef transforms simple ingredients into a gourmet meal.
meanings.sent3: The pumpkin transforms into a carriage in the fairy tale.
meanings.sent4: His determination transforms obstacles into opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The power of love transforms a heart of stone into one of compassion.
